The Steam Reviews for this game have become a mini-meme of sorts. Thus, you may be confused. This is what it says on the tin- A class-based FPS with a unique art style and sense of humour not often found. It can be played as a hat-trading simulator, a fun group game or just a unique FPS experience. Don't feel pressured to buy anything, but if you wear the items Pyrovision Goggles and Ghostly Gibus together, you'll be looked down on.

My favourite game with over 2.2k hours.

Experienced almost everything from casual, to community servers, to in game & third party competetive matchmaking, to Man vs Machine and much more.

What hits me in this game is its cartoonish graphics, pure gameplay, high learning curve and every individual class.

Bots are ruining the game unfortunately and Valve refuses to do jackdoodoo about it.

9/10 but if Valve fixes the bot problem and begins to update the game with more major updates easy 10/10.

Skoda że Valve tak zrujnowało tę grę przechodząc na F2P. Wszechobecna dzieciarnia uniemożliwia taktyczną grę i krzyczy przez mikrofon. Najbardziej raniące jest to że osoby które zapłaciły za grę, nie dostały w ramach rekompensaty kompletnie nic. Ale plusem jest to że w tej grze FPS jest szybka rozgrywka i mieszanka humoru tworzy tę grę najlepszą w swym rodzaju :)

Oh what can I even say about this game?  It's a true classic.  

Played the original to death as a kid and then when this came out I scooped up The Orange Box immediately.  

Since all of the elements that have been added over the years are purely cosmic for the most part, and this is just a fun whimsical game to play from the start.  It is a must for any true gamer -- an instant classic.

The only downside is that with the new loot system I would like more ability to see some of the items crafted in these boxes since it is such a trivial process to do so within the community, but I can do without it.  Won't participate in a key gambling economy beyond the small bit we can without throwing any chips in.

Overall -- play it.  Love it.
good game, got bored in like 2 hours tho.

It's one of those games that is equally maddening and pleasing.  I love it, and I hate it.  It's so well balanced, that some maps will drag on for hours and hours.  I really miss and liked the old Unreal Tournament or Tribes much better than this game.
It's nice.

IN ITS CURRENT STATE I THINK ITS A GREAT GAME.BUT THERE ARE MANY THINGS LEFT TO BALANCE,LIKE WEAPONS, TEAM  SETTUPS AND MATCHES IN GENERAL.BUT ASIDE FROM BALANCING I THINK THE WORST THING IN THIS GAME IS THE SHORTNESS OF MATCHES.A STANDART VALVE SERVER GAME CAN ONLY BE 2 OR 3 ROUNDS,WHEREAS BEFORE MYM UPDATE THERE WERE MORE THAN JUST 3 ROUNDS.THE MATCHES DO NOT LAST VERY LONG IN MOST MAPS.I THINK THE BEST THING THE VALVE CAN DO IS REVERT THE GAME BACK TO ITS OLDER STATE.THAT WAY IT CAN BECOME MORE ENJOYABLE THAN IT IS CURRENTLY.OH AND ALSO THEY REALLY NEED TO MAKE A BETTER TRAINING MODE FOR THE GAME.IVE SEEN COUNTLESS AMOUNTS OF NEW PLAYERS WHO DIDNT KNEW WHAT THEY WERE DOING AND WERE DOING SILLY STUFF AND GETTING KICKED FROM THE SERVER BECAUSE OF THAT.ANYWAYS IM RECOMMENDING THIS GAME IN HOPES OF IT GETTING BETTER.:)

Not much to say than great game

Edit: played a bit more, still a good game
lol

Vanilla gameplay gets repetitive (I barely played it in fact since it got boring very quickly) after a while but the mod and community support is what makes this game very good because there is a massive variety of custom game modes and custom maps to play on.

But after everything i have done before, i no longer found enjoyment and just ran around in achievement idle servers, i have somewhat have respect to those that dedicate their massive hours playing this game finding the fun and enjoyment in it, but for me it got boring after a while.

I would still recommend this game for newcomers if they are looking for something fun to do.

Что такое Team Fortress 2 в 2017 году:
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда в твоей команде 90% игроков f2p новички, а у противника 90% опытных игроков.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда под конец матча у тебя очков больше чем у всей твоей команды вместе взятой.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда после первого раунда вы уже играете 7 vs 12.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда за место ливнувшего нуба к противнику присоединяется ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ 150 лвл, и вся ваша команда внезапно начинает проигрывать.
Баланс в Team Fortress 2 – это когда вам наоборот вместо ливнувшего ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥а закидывает f2p нуба 1лвл, и вся команда также начинает проигрывать.
---
Игроки в Team Fortress 2 – это когда твоя команда на 70% состоит из бесполезных снайперов и шпионов.
Игроки в Team Fortress 2 – это когда ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ы старой закалки играют жёстче читеров, и без шансов нагибают весь сервер.
---
Рандом в Team Fortress 2 – это когда за всю игру тебе выпадает 1 крит, и выпадет он во время подготовки.
Рандом в Team Fortress 2 – это когда все убивают тебя с одного удара в мили сражении.
---
Team Fortress 2 – это когда различных шапок в игре больше, чем разнообразного оружия.
---
И многое-многое другое… Люблю эту игру!
10 гибусов в твоей команде из 11.

Ta gra świetnie rozwija planowanie taktyk gamingowych, a ta recenzja jest pisana przez gracza, który już trochę o niej wie. Mam przegrane 205 godzin!

After I picked it up again , I believe it was probably the time to post a new one.

Team Fortress 2 is a good game again in my opinion.
The Meat your match update , despite being awful at the start is actually is good now.
It's not perfect , it needs improvements , but I do believe the TF team already does a lot of work behind the scenes.

Team Fortress still has a magical feel to it , that you probably can't get with other big titles. And this game is almost 10 years old. So that says something.

Play it , like it , or dislike it. It's not up to me to judge. But I can tell you this game is good

So here's the story
When I was 10, I was watching dank memes ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) and then I saw the word "Meet the Scout" in one vine
Then I started searching that word on YouTube, then I have the game's name: "Team Fortress 2"
On a beautiful day, I ask my bro can you download it for me? He argeed
Then I start playin on my account, I was a noob -_-
I always wearing achievement hats and noobs things, and idk how to play good
Then I start a new account on October, 2016
I'm in love with this game
At school, my head just thinking about it (doesn't mean I suck at studying)
And I absolute love this game, really much
And Charmx ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
Ya know, I am an American but lived in VietNam for family buisnesses when I was 7
And sometimes I suck English
Vietnamese students in my school don't like me
But there i... wait, BACK TO WORK
I have spend lots of money in this game
I'm young so 50$ is a large amount of money
Soooo thanks for reading this review and see ya ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
